goal.en: “Through mathematical derivations and related computer programming, students will learn basic theory of inverse methods and their applications on solving different geophysical problems.“
goal.ch: 讓學生理解逆推問題的數學理論，並利用電腦程式將逆推方法應用於不同的地球物理問題。

content.en: “The class will introduce difference methods for solving linear inverse problems, and discuss geophysical examples through mathematical formulation and computer programming (mainly by Matlab). The class contents include four main topics:(1) Statistical aspects of linear regression-the maximum likelihood estimation;(2) Resolution of the generalized inverse solution;(3) Regularization and stability of ill-posed problems;(4) Iterative methods.“
content.ch: “本課程將系列介紹各種線性逆推方法，並藉由例題演算及電腦程式(主要用Matlab)來探討逆推方法在地球物理問題上的應用。主要的課程內容包含“線性逆推”的四大主題：(1)線性迴歸的統計意義—最大概似法(2)逆推結果的解析度分析(3)不適定問題的正規化與穩定性分析(4)疊代法“

textbook.en: “Textbook: Aster, R. C., B. Borchers, and C. H. Thurber (2013), Parameter Estimation and Inverse Problems, 2nd ed., Academic Press, 360pp.Reference: Menke, W. (2012), Geophysical Data Analysis: Discrete Inverse Theory, 3rd ed., Academic Press, 293pp.“
textbook.ch: “教科書: Aster, R. C., B. Borchers, and C. H. Thurber (2013), Parameter Estimation and Inverse Problems, 2nd ed., Academic Press, 360pp.參考書: Menke, W. (2012), Geophysical Data Analysis: Discrete Inverse Theory, 3rd ed., Academic Press, 293pp.“
